DialogueLines.Name: Lvl_01_01_Phase01Start
DialogueLines.String: Initiating phase 1. Avoid all incoming obstacles. Making contact will result in failure.

DialogueLines.Name: Lvl_01_01_Phase02Start
DialogueLines.String: Initiating phase 2. Scale all incoming obstacles. Making contact will result in failure.

DialogueLines.Name: Lvl_01_01_PhaseEndFailure
DialogueLines.String: Subject made contact with obstacle. Test failed.

DialogueLines.Name: Lvl_01_01_TestEndSuccess
DialogueLines.String: Course cleared, please proceed to the next room.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_EnterMindspace
DialogueLines.String: If a button is grayed out, it can not be pressed in your current form. Enter your mindspace to create a route for your clone to take.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_MoveToButton
DialogueLines.String: Please press the button to open the door.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_DisposeOfClone
DialogueLines.String: You may now return to reality, as this route is sufficient.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_ExplainReplay
DialogueLines.String: The clone will now follow its designated route.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_PressButtonToOpenBridge
DialogueLines.String: Get a new clone to press the button to extend the bridge.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_AutomaticDisintegration
DialogueLines.String: You can only handle up to 30 seconds in your mindspace, after this the clone will disintegrate. You can still dispose of it earlier, should you want to.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_CreateNewCloneToTryAgain
DialogueLines.String: Subject failed the very simple task of pressing the button. Please try again.

DialogueLines.Name: CloneTutorial_RetryCloneRecording
DialogueLines.String: Oops... That wasn't supposed to happen. You can retry with your clone taking the same route.

DialogueLines.Name: ButtonDepress
DialogueLines.String: Some buttons will turn off as soon as they stop being touched, while others could stay on for some time.
